text: Jacob Markstom leads Calgary onto the ice for warmup so hes confirmed for his eighth straight start. Anthony Stolarz goes for Anaheim. #Flames #FlyTogether
Anthony Stolarz has the start tonight for the Ducks against the Flames. Troy Terry back in action. Simon Benoit draws back in on blue line Josh Mahura out.
Anthony Stolarz to start vs. CGY on Wednesday https://t.co/S2PQ7inMZM
